downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync Room System Administrative Web Portal for Lync Server 2013
downloadDescription: A Lync Server 2013 web component that allows IT administrators to monitor and manage their organization's Lync Room System devices.
detailsSection: Microsoft Lync Room System (LRS) edition is a new Microsoft Lync unified communications client that has been optimized for Lync meetings in physical conference rooms. Install this web component on Lync Server 2013 Front End servers in the pool where the Lync Room System accounts reside.
systemRequirementsSection:
Pre-requisites

In order to use Microsoft Lync Room System Administrative Portal, you must also have the following installed:

Lync Server 2013 Cumulative Update 2
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Click the Download box and save the file to your hard disk.
  2. Follow the Microsoft Lync Room System Administrative Web Portal deployment instructions, which can be found here.

To remove the download file:
  1. To remove the download file, delete the LyncRoomAdminPortal.exe file saved to your hard disk.

To uninstall this program:
  1. Go to the control panel and remove the application “Microsoft Lync Room System Adninistrative Web Portal” from Add or Remove programs
